ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And rejected Our signs as lies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and roundly denied Our Signs as false.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they denied Our signs to the extreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But they denied Our Ayat Kidhdhaba.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And called Our communications a lie, giving the lie (to the truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and they cried loud lies to Our signs;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They called Our revelations false with strong denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and they rejected outright Our signs;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they belied Our revelations with strong belying.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and they denied Our signs mendaciously,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But they (impudently) treated Our Signs as false.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But they belied Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, and that which Our Prophet (Peace be upon him) brought) completely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and they absolutely belied Our verses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they denied Our signs utterly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:28] and they denied Our signs, the Qur’ān, mendaciously,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They called Our revelations) Our Scripture and Messenger (false with strong denial.
